__comment: Compose and Main are two configurations we have in CI.
Each can have include and exclude filters where these filters run a
'contains' match on the project name. e.g. if the project name is compose-runtime
adding an include filter with value 'compose' is enough to run it. Similarly, you
can disable all compose projects from main build by adding a 'compose' exclude key.
If the project matches both exclude and include filters, exclude is prioritized.
